title: Got into PBE, but can't get the link to load to Register *sad face*
body:
Hi there,

Looking for assistance.

I applied for the PBE several months ago and only got the email yesterday that i was accepted.

However the link for me to register the account is giving me an error: 500 page or doesn't load.

Is the page down? or moved?

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
Seeing an error 500 page when trying to get into the PBE is a live issue we're aware of. While it's not an ideal solution, some players have been able to get around this by using a VPN to get to the download page.

We're still working on it, but let me know how this works for you!

Hello, is it possible to email a member of Riot to create my PBE account for me, then i can change the password?

The page has problem loading itself and has error's whenever I try in different browsers.

a little assistance would be appreciated.

I won't be able to make a PBE account for you, but I could suggest trying to load the page on a different computer or check back on a different day. It's not the best solution, but we are still working on a fix for this!

thanks for the feedback

i am currently downloading the PBE client, and that fine, but i cant make an account, that page or the page thatn leads to it won't load or fails to load.

will keep trying and update if i ever get trough thx
